for cncf projects or really any open

you're better off focusing in other

one key indicator of project health is

projects that are responsive to issues
ers and other contributions are more

so as a project you'll want to make sure

they'll hopefully have more free time to

now most projects i've worked on have

when response times go up meaning it

one way to look at responsiveness is to

this is an indication of how long

now most people get a response in less

and they've been pretty steady at the

now if these lines start moving up with

now a very small project with only a few

diverse response

that could indicate that almost

other things that might impact

another way to look at responsiveness is

um because the more issues people are

but it might be an indicator that there

it looks to me like it was probably a

it's important to look at whether people

stable or increasing numbers of

maybe it isn't as inclusive as it could

if your project is regularly scheduled

if your project is very active or maybe
